__TOC__

* Contact: <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~joshua-oqo|Joshua Pollack]]</nowiki>
* Make: Oqo
* Brand: (UMPC)
* Model: Model 02
* Website: http://www.oqo.com/products/, http://www.oqo.com/unsupported/linux/
=== Current Issues ===

* Needs a kernel patch for DMA enabling
* Requires manually adding `ide-generic` to the initrd
* Need to use alternate installer as Ubiquity doesn't fit on 800x480 screen
* Sound (HDA) only comes out of headphone jack, not speakers (Jack sense issues)
* Based on Sigmaltel audio codec

=== System Info ===

<pre>
OQO Inc.
OQO Model 2
No System Version

* Zoom out 0xe077 (repeatable)
* Zoom in 0xe056 (repeatable)
* Rotate 0xe078 (repeatable)
* Brightness down 0xe061 (repeats)
* Birghtness up 0xe061 (repeats)
* Wireless toggle 0xe00e (repeats)
* Fn-Esc ("Lock") Ctrl-Alt-Delete
* Desk event key 0xe079
* Mute 0xe020
* Video 0xe07d
* Volume Up 0xe030
* Volume Down 0xe02e
* ACPI LID event on open/close.

Others:

* Capacitive scrollbars: send mouse-wheel events 
* 800x480 screen
* Keyboard backlight (hardware, no event)
* Fn+trackball sends mouse scroll events (hardware)
* AV 3.5mm jack switchable between Line In, Line Out, Mic In, Headphone Out
* HDMI
* Proprietary dock connect (VGA, Ethernet, Power)
* USB type A.
* Dock insert/remove event (more psmouse events?)

Notes:

* BT, Wifi and CDMA radios are on by default on boot (BIOS configuration)
* Radios can be toggled by software (method unknown---check Windows drivers)
